item.title: Reporting on PagerDuty call outs with Splunk
item.description: Pagerduty has a pretty kickass reporting feature, but my aim is to create a holistic dashboard for my team’s operational work, and to do that I need to have all my data in one place. That one place? Splunk! I love Splunk, have done ever since seeing a presentation on it years ago, but for a long time it stayed out of reach for mere mortals due to its price point.
